manifest.title: Shiori
manifest.author: Felipe Martin
manifest.description:
### About

Shiori is a simple bookmarks manager written in the Go language. Intended as a simple clone of Pocket. You can use it as a command line application or as a web application. This application is distributed as a single binary, which means it can be installed and used easily.

### Features

- Basic bookmarks management i.e. add, edit, delete and search.
- Import and export bookmarks from and to Netscape Bookmark file.
- Import bookmarks from Pocket.
- Simple and clean command line interface.
- Simple and pretty web interface for those who don't want to use a command line app.
- Portable, thanks to its single binary format.
- Support for sqlite3, PostgreSQL and MySQL as its database.
- Where possible, by default shiori will parse the readable content and create an offline archive of the webpage.
- [BETA] web extension support for Firefox and Chrome.

register-admin.message: On first visit, add a new account. Once a new account is created, the default credentials will no longer work.

manifest.postInstallMessage:
The initial credentials are: **Username**: shiori
**Password**: gopher
Then, click the Settings gear icon and add an account. **Important:** Once a new account is created, the default credentials will no longer work.
manifest.changelog:
* Update shiori to 1.8.0
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/releases/tag/v1.8.0)
* feat(apiv1): refactor tags api ([#1075](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1075))
* feat: add PWA support share functionality ([#1060](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1060))
* feat: add apis to handle bookmark tags ([#1081](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1081))
* feat: allow tag filtering and count retrieval via api v1 ([#1079](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1079))
* feat: improve SQLite performance ([#1024](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1024))
* feat: reverts message in json output and allows configuration ([#1082](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1082))
* feat: support proxy forward headers authentication ([#1105](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1105))
* fix: auth validation on existing sessions, rely on token only ([#1069](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1069))
* fix: incorrectly set cookie's expires value in login.js ([#1049](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1049))
* fix: parse pocket new CSV format ([#1112](https://github.com/go-shiori/shiori/issues/1112])
